name: The River (itch)
description:
Made in 2.5 days for Love Jam 2019.  The .love file can be run in Love2d  version 11.2.

Recover salvage from the bottom of the river, while avoiding being eaten by the giant catfish!. How much scrap can you recover before you meet you demise? 

"Enjoy" the hastily loving made hand-draw art made by someone with 0  artistic talent.
